None.Name: Bombard
None.Description: Every 4 seconds, unit hurls balls of ice that deal 170 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 260 in total. Knocks back small and medium units. Affects ground targets only.

None.Name: Glacier Shield
None.Description: Builds up a regenerating frosty barrier which absorbs up to 600 damage but will only regenerate if the unit is not attacking.

en.Description:
Bombard: +10 damage per target, 10 in total
New Ability: Glacier Shield
Bombard: +20 damage per target, 30 in total
Bombard: +20 Damage per target, 30 in total

New Ability: Glacier Shield
Bombard: +20 damage per target, 30 in total
Bombard: +20 Damage per target, 30 in total

Extra.en: Mountaineer will take up to 1 second of delay before actually animating and dealing damage. This still counts as attacking though,  and therefore hinders his Glacier Shield,  which can be a nuisance.
